text: Nansho yakhalhaka opani anrumelhenlhe Kuristo ahaana alhoko aya arii anankhwelhi o ikekhiaye, yayo phi nophwanelhiya waalhelha, mena kuhiwe uhiya ntheko upangiye ni nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo, ikhalhe wiira nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo apangeke ntheko wo waalhelha manyanankhwelhi ahiri ni ittu menamena.
